Sale Price (Leave blank for no discount): Sale Price (Leave blank for no discount)
If the product has multiple properties s: If the product has multiple properties such as colors and sizes, the price for the variations must be changed because this price will not be effective.
The net profit gets calculated through t: The net profit gets calculated through this field
Controls the appearance of the section a: Controls the appearance of the section at the beginning, the higher the number, the more it appears before other products. For example, if this section has a priority of 9 and a section has a priority of 7, 9 will appear before 7.
Some marketers love these features and b: Some marketers love these features and believe they increase sales, and they do increase your sales, but we do not recommend some of these features, such as the fake visitors and fake discount counter, because the customer will confuse you with other marketers he has dealt with before and had bad experiences with. Imagine with me that a customer bought a product from another marketer who uses these features on his site, and the product arrived to the customer with problems and didn't work, and the marketer didn't refund the money or return the product. When he sees any store with these same distinctive marks, he will think it is the same person, so be careful when using these features. They may benefit you in the short term and increase sales, but in the long run, they will damage your reputation.
This option makes the customer skip the: This option makes the customer skip the cart adding process and buy the product directly.
Text written on the Buy Now button: Text written on the Buy Now button
Activate the Fixed Buy Button at the Bot: Activate the Fixed Buy Button at the Bottom of the Page
The Buy button will appear fixed at the: The Buy button will appear fixed at the bottom of the page as the customer moves around the page. We recommend activating it.
Purchase the product from the same page: Purchase the product from the same page
Make checkout form before product descri: Make checkout form before product description
The checkout form will appear before the: The checkout form will appear before the product description
This option makes reviews appear on the: This option makes reviews appear on the product page
Enable this option to show the customer: Enable this option to show the customer a fake number, such as 'Now 20 visitors' or 'Now 60 visitors'.
Minimum number of visitors currently vie: Minimum number of visitors currently viewing the page
Maximum number of visitors currently vie: Maximum number of visitors currently viewing the page
This feature displays a fake low stock,: This feature displays a fake low stock, such as 'Only 5 pieces left'.
This is the fake number that will be dis: This is the fake number that will be displayed to the customer, and don't worry if the customer makes a purchase, this number will decrease in front of him.
A fake timer that appears to the custome: A fake timer that appears to the customer telling them that there is only an hour left for the discount and counts down in seconds.
Number of hours in the fake timer: Number of hours in the fake timer
The product will be hidden and will not: The product will be hidden and will not appear in the store.
The quantity counter will be hidden.
Hide the header on the product page to d: Hide the header on the product page to display only the landing page.
